backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: removing the 'coming soon' alert and adding Google Form redirect to the WaitlistCTA Join button.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the ORBIT space-themed social network UI with glassmorphism, animations, and waitlist functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the Space-Tech aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that loads the React app into a root div and imports the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the OrbitScreen component and imports global styles.
frontend/src/components/orbit/AvatarBadg: Reusable avatar component with image loading, fallback initials, configurable sizes, neon borders, and online/offline status indicators.
frontend/src/components/orbit/ChatOverla: Modal chat overlay with glassmorphic styling, friend header, message area, input form, and smooth open/close animations.
frontend/src/components/orbit/GlassPanel: Simple wrapper component that applies glassmorphic styling with backdrop blur to its children.
frontend/src/components/orbit/OrbitAvata: Component displaying a central user avatar with five friend avatars orbiting around it using CSS animations with staggered delays.
frontend/src/components/orbit/OrbitScree: Main screen component managing friend data state, coordinating all child components (Starfield, OrbitAvatars, ChatOverlay, WaitlistCTA), and handling friend click interactions.
Canvas-based animated starfield background with slow-drifting, twinkling stars optimized for performance using throttled animation loop and proper cleanup.
frontend/src/components/orbit/WaitlistCT: Bottom-positioned button with pulsing glow animation that redirects to Google Form waitlist, includes hover effects and footer attribution with caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook for managing ICP backend actor instances with Internet Identity authentication, automatic refetching on identity changes, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook for backend integration that currently returns actor and fetching state from useActor, with no active backend data requirements.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with cosmic/neon theme using OKLCH colors (purple, blue, cyan), glassmorphism utilities, and neon glow effects for a futuristic UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with OKLCH color system, custom neon shadows, orbital animations, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking completed features (removing 'coming soon' alert, adding Google Form redirect) and pending feature request AR-1 for the Join button update.
